data.text: Jisasi'a amanage huno amagema nentaza disaipol naga'a zamasami'ne, Reheno kezana egahie. Hianagi iza'o reramatga nehimofonkura nasunku huntoe!
Witi refuzafu nepaza havere nofi anakiza, anankempi rentete'za, hagerimpi atrenageno uramisiana knare zantfa hugahie. Neone nagapinti magomofo azeri trakama huzankura,
tamagra kva hiho! Neramafuma kumima hanigeta, haviza nehane huta hinkeno, agu'ama rukrehema hanigeta, kumi'a atrentegahaze.
Ana ne'mo'ma mago knamofo agu'afi 7ni'a zupa (seven times) 7ni'a kumi huramanteteno, ana kefozama'agu agu'a rukrahe huno 7ni'a zupa eno nasunku hue hanigeta, kumi'a atrentegahaze.
Aposol naga'amo'za, Ramofona anage hu'za asmi'naze, tamentintia eri ra huo hu'za hazageno,

Ramo'a anage huno zamasami'ne, Tamagrima tamementintimo'ma masteti zafa ragagna hu'nenigeta, mulberi zafagura amne tasagi hunka hagerimpi ome regrio hanageno'a, ketamia amage'anteno amne anara hugahie.
Ina'imoka amuno tamifina kazokzo eri'za vahe ka'amo'ma hoza tinka eri'zano, sipisipi kegava nehaniregati enkenka, ame hunka emaninka ne'zana no hugahano?
Hu'neanagi kva'amo'a amanahu kea kazokzo eri'za ne'agura osugahio, kukenaka'a eri hutenka nezama nesuazana retro hunenantege'na, tine nezanena netesugenka, henka tine nezane kagra negahane hugahie?
Hanki agra kazokzo eri'za ne'agura musenkea huontegahio? Na'ankure huo huno'ma hunte'neazana hu'ne.
Ana hu'negu kagranena, maka'zama Anumzamo huo huno hugante'neazama hanunka anage huo, tagra knare osunona kazokzo eriza vahemota, Anumzamo eriho huno hurante'nea eri'za e'nerune huta hugahaze.
Jisasi'a Jerusalemi vunaku nevuno, Sameria kuma'ene Galili kumamofo amunompi rugitagino vu'ne.
Nevuno mago kumapi ufregeno, 10ni'a fugo namune vahe'mo'za ogamnu otiza mani'ne'za ome tutagiha hunte'naze.
Hagi zamagra amanage hu'za kezati'naze, Jisasiga kva ne'moke, kasuntagiranto! hu'za nehazageno,
Jisasi'a nezmageno amanage huno zamasmi'ne, Tamagra vuta pristi vahete tamavufga ome zamaveri hiho,  hige'za nevazageno fugo namuzmimo'a amne higeza agru hu'naze.
Hagi mago'zmimo'a keana avufgamo so'e higeno, rukrahe huno ranke huno Anumzamofo agi erisaga nehuno,
Jisasi agafi avugosaregati epri huno, susu huno musenke huntene. Ana nera Sameria nere.
Anante Jisasi'a anage hu'ne, 10ni'a vahe'mokizmi fugo namumo'a so'e hige'za agru hu'naze. Hianagi 9ni'a vahe zaga iga mani'naze?
Mago vahe'mo'a eama huno Anumzamofona ra agi omigeno, ama megi'a ne'mokepi?
Jisasi'a anage huno ana ne'mofonku hu'ne, Kamentintimo kazeri so'e hianka otinka vuo.
Farisi vahe'mo'za Anumzamofo kumakura, inan knare egahie hu'za Jisasina antahigazageno, kenona zimirera anage hu'ne, Anumzamofo kumara mago avame'zane esigeta onkesageno,
amagi keho huge, antugi keho hu'za zamagra osugahaze. Na'ankure Anumzamofo kumamo'a ko tamagri amu'nompi me'ne.
Anage nehuno, amagema nentaza disaipol naga'a zamasamino, Mago kna ne-eankino, ana knarera Vahe'mofo Mofavre kenaku hanazanagi, tamagra onketfa hugahaze.
Zamagra anage hu'za tmasamigahaze, antufi mani'neanki keho huge! Amafi mani'neanki keho! Hanigetma anantega ovuta, zmavaririta ana vahera oviho.
Vahemofo Mofavre'ma esia kna'arera kopsi'namo monare rurarage huno remsa nehigeno, mago kazigati remsa huno mago kaziga atuparega neviankna hugahie.
Hu'neanagi ese'zana Agra rama'a knazampi unefresigeno, ama mani'nona gnafi vahe'mo'za zmefi humigahaze.
Noa knafima hu'nazaza hu'za, Vahe'mofo Mofavremoma enaku'ma hania knafina, anahu zamavuzamava nehu'za,
zamagra ne'zana nene'za, tina nene'za, arave nehu'za, ara masi omi ami nehazageno, Noa'a vente agu'afi marerigeno, timo'a miko zamahe refite'ne.  (Jen-Agfa 7)
Loti gnafinena anahukna hu'za, ne'zana nene'za, tina nene'za, miza neseza, zagore netre'za hoza negriza nona negiza hu'naze.
Hianagi Lotima zamatreno Sodomu kumapinti atiramino vu'nea knazupa, tefizo hu'nea havemo ko' riaza huno zamahe refite'ne.
Vahe'mofo Mofavrema eama hunaku'ma hania knarera, anahukna zamavuzmava hugahaze.
Ana knazupa nomofo agofetu mani'nenigeno, fenozama'a agu'afi me'nesimo'a eramino fenoma'a erino ati oramigahie. Anahukna huno hozafima mani'nenimo'a rukrehe huno omeno.
Hanki Loti nenaronte fore hu'nea zanku tamagesa antahiho. (Jen-Agf 19:24-26)
Iza'o asimu'a azeri kona hunaku hanimo'a, asimu'a atregahianki, iza'o asimu'a atresimo'a, asimu'a erigahie.
Hanki Nagra anage hu'na neramasamue. Ana knazupa tare vahe sipare kenage mase'nesnake'no, mago'mofo nevreno mago'mofo atregahie.
Tare atre'mokea witi raga'a refuzafunepeke mani'nesnapinti, magomofo nevreno mago'mofo atregahie.
Hagi tare netremoke hozafi mani'nesnakeno, mago'mofona nevreno, mago'mofona atregahie.

Anankemofo nona zamagra Jisasinku hu'za, Ramoka inantega anazana fore hugahie? Hu'za amage'ma nentaza disaipol naga'mo'za antahigazageno, anage huno zamasami'ne, Fri'nea avufgama, me'nesirega anantega tumpa namamo'za eri atru hugahaze.
